data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 2,400 souls in Central Eleuthera and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central Eleuthera, Bahamas

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 950 believers in Central Eleuthera that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Central Eleuthera, Bahamas to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,400 people living in the state of Central Eleuthera.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Governor’s Harbour
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Governor’s Harbour, Central Eleuthera, Bahamas.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Central Eleuthera, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Central Eleuthera, Bahamas.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Central Eleuthera, Bahamas has a population of 2,400.

We estimate Central Eleuthera has 950 people who might know Jesus, 1,317 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 133 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Central Eleuthera, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
